name: How Many ?!
description:
" How Many ?! " is a mobile phone game realized alone in only one month during the One Button Game project at Isart Digital.

The game is developed on Unity et all sprites were drawn by myself.

In "How Many ?!"  you play as Virgil who should count visitors who enter a museum before a world pandemic.  He should adapt to the sanitary rules changes during the three levels of the game. The game got a multiplayer mode for four players!
